title: "Your account has been logged into from another computer" Happened twice in one week
body:
So I'm pretty spooked about this. I've been kicked out of League twice now in the past week, with the message saying that someone else has logged into my account from another computer. I've never shared my account with anyone, as far as I know I don't have any keyloggers so I don't know what to think.

I just recently changed my password, but I'm worried Riot will see this and think it's suspicious activity (sharing account, etc.) and that's the last thing I want since I just got back into League in the past month and I primarily play Ranked.

What sucks is this forced me to dodge champion select right as the game was about to begin, which incurred LP loss and a 30m dodge timer. Should I be worried for my account's safety and possible actions taken by Riot? Pls no :(

replies.body: Eeeee that's no good! It sounds like someone must have brute forced their way into your account. I want to make sure your account is protected, so hit us up in our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) as soon as possible!
Thanks! I just finished filling it out. I should mention I changed my password the second time I got kicked off (when I said recently), and sorry for getting back late. Been busy!
just check and see if there are any games being played on it thats not by you and contact the riot support desk they can check and see whos logging onto your account.
Thanks! I went ahead and did that with the link Broporo provided. :D

or you could be like me and have your password randomly change and have riot tell you to fk off cause i didn't memorize every fkn detail... i spent 150 bucks on that account and riot did nothing at all
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}
This just happend to me, it only happend once and it happend shortly after I logged in, is there a possibility that it could be a glitch.
I had the same, was pretty scared but sent a support ticket just to be sure.
Mine has been saying this for a month now, no games played nothing im concerned with, id rather just not be interrupted and considered a dodger every once in a while when im trying to play.
